name: gcs-dev
body:
#Welcome to **gcs-dev**!

##About
This repository hosts digital versions of _Die Griechischen Christlichen Schriftsteller_ (GCS) by Adolf Harnack and Theodor Mommsen.

These XML files were produced by data entry company [Digital Divide Data](http://www.digitaldividedata.org/) (DDD), who corrected and encoded hOCR output generated by [Bruce Robertson](https://github.com/brobertson) in accordance with the latest [EpiDoc](http://sourceforge.net/p/epidoc/wiki/Home/) standards.
While adequate, more can and should be done to improve the XML (the -dev(elopment) suffix indicates the repository is open to improvement).

Find little more information about GCS [on Wikipedia](https://de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Die_Griechischen_Christlichen_Schriftsteller).

#Volumes

##Epiphanius
* _[Ancoratus und Panarion, Vol. 1](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/gcs-dev/blob/master/epiphanius_1915_ancoratus_panarion_vol1.xml)_ (1915) ed. Karl Holl. Leipzig: J. C. Hinrichs'sche Buchhandlung.
* _[Panarion, Vol. 2](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/gcs-dev/blob/master/epiphanius_1922_panarion_vol2.xml)_ (1922) ed. Karl Holl. Leipzig: J. C. Hinrichs'sche Buchhandlung.

##Eusebius
* _[Werke, Vol. 1](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/gcs-dev/blob/master/eusebius_1902_werke_vol1.xml)_ (1902) ed. Dr. Ivar A. Heikel. Leipzig. J. C. Hinrichs'sche Buchhandlung.
* _[Werke, Vol. 2.1, Kirchengeschichte](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/gcs-dev/blob/master/eusebius_1903_werke_vol2_pt1.xml)_ (1903) ed. Dr. Theodor Mommsen. Leipzig: J. C. Hinrichs'sche Buchhandlung.
* _[Werke, Vol. 2.2, Kirchengeschichte](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/gcs-dev/blob/master/eusebius_1908_werke_vol2_pt2.xml)_ (1908) ed. Dr. Theodor Mommsen. Leipzig: J. C. Hinrichs'sche Buchhandlung.
* _[Werke, Vol. 2.3, Kirchengeschichte](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/gcs-dev/blob/master/eusebius_1909_werke_vol2_pt3.xml)_ (1909) ed. Dr. Eduard Schwartz und Dr. Theodor Mommsen. Leipzig: J. C. Hinrichs'sche Buchhandlung.
* _[Werke, Vol. 3.1 Das Onomastikon / 3.2 Die Theophanie](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/gcs-dev/blob/master/eusebius_1904_werke_vol3_pt1.xml)_ (1904) ed. Dr. Erich Klostermann / Dr. Hugo Gressmann. Leipzig: J. C. Hinrichs'sche Buchhandlung.
*
